channel.title: Barrow help
channel.description: in my server the barrow npcs drop barrow items how do i make it so there in the hill and they drop keys that ppl can use on chest and get items

item.title: Barrow help
item.dc:creator: @raped_by_who raped by who
item.description:
@raped_by_who wrote:

NPCDrops.cfg

Client.java code –

if(object == 9999 && playerHasKeys()){ addItem(Item.randomBarrows(), 1); }

[CODE]public boolean playerHasKeys(){
if(playerHasItem(“Bla bla bla”)
return true;

} else {
return;
}
}[/CODE]

no, i didnt use conventions, and that code isnt correct, its a template. Im not going to spoonfeed you

Read full topic
